sentences.english: Princess Aiko was back to school on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 爱子公主已于本周一回学校上课。

sentences.english: Strength of a mother's love can be propelled to the extent to raise up a car supressed upon her own kid.

sentences.english: Sadder were the times when letters came from Aiko.
sentences.chinese: 每次接到爱子的来信都更加令人悲伤。

sentences.english: Jesus christ is the only-Begotten beloved Son of God the Father, and is the second Person of the Trinity.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣基督是父神的独生爱子，是三位一体神的第二位。

sentences.english: Aiko inviting silk in multimode birthday when Abram, and said she hopes they meet communication.

sentences.english: The sleeping Child you're holding is the Great, I Am.

sentences.english: I thought only mother loves son in the world.
